scenario.name: UAC Register
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[$requestURI];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[$from]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[$to]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 60 Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp

REGISTER sip:[$requestURI];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[$from]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[$to]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 60 Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp [authentication]
